fields.comment: this is mBody->GetBodyId() - not to be confused with uid, has to be tracked separately, since the mBody pointer is not unique
fields.name: mBodyId

fields.comment: if 1, will lift the body upwards if it is inside ground
fields.name: hax_fix_going_through_ground

fields.comment: hax_fix_going_through_ground has to be set, if set will lift the body upwards if it is inside sand
fields.name: hax_fix_going_through_sand

fields.comment: if 1, will go through sand PhysicsBridge::mGoThroughSand = 1
fields.name: go_through_sand

fields.comment: if 1, the simulation might destroy this body if it's hidden under sand. Problematic if you have a small piece with joint attached to something like the wheels of minecart. Set to 0 in cases like that
fields.name: auto_clean

fields.comment: if 1, we will mark our predicted aabb as a box2d update area.
fields.name: force_add_update_areas

fields.comment: if 1, will kill the entity when physics body is destroyed
fields.name: kill_entity_if_body_destroyed

fields.comment: if 1, will destroy the entity after initialization has been done based the entity's PhysicsBodyComponents and JointComponents
fields.name: kill_entity_after_initialized

fields.comment: if 1, initialization occurs only when done via for example lua component and Physic2InitFromComponents()
fields.name: manual_init

fields.comment: if 1, root body is destroyed if the entity is destroyed
fields.name: destroy_body_if_entity_destroyed

fields.comment: TODO
fields.name: root_offset_x

fields.comment: TODO
fields.name: root_offset_y

fields.comment: TODO
fields.name: init_offset_x

fields.comment: TODO
fields.name: init_offset_y

fields.comment: private variable, please don't mess around with this
fields.name: mActiveState

fields.comment: private variable, please don't mess around with this
fields.name: mLocalPosition

fields.comment: the number of pixels the body had when it was originally created
fields.name: mPixelCountOrig

fields.comment: private variable, please don't mess around with this
fields.name: mInitialized

fields.comment: if set, tracks the number of csolidcells the body has
fields.name: mPixelCount

fields.comment: this is sure the bodies are only parsed once
fields.name: mRefreshed
